title: Incident Analysis and Response
description: Analyze system incidents and create comprehensive response plans
example_prompt: Help me analyze this system incident and create a response plan. Include root cause analysis, immediate mitigation steps, and long-term prevention strategies. Document the timeline and impact.

environmentVariables.name: data_file
environmentVariables.description: Path to the PagerDuty incident activity CSV file

environmentVariables.name: time_period
environmentVariables.description: Time period to analyze (e.g., 'last 30 days', 'last quarter')
